segments.text: Room service . May I come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Put them on there please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.If you need anything , just call the Room service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . By the way , what shall we do with the plates when we finish our meal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just leave them outside the door . We will take care of it .
segments.speaker: S1
